body.name: COOFANDY Men's Knit Polo Shirts Short Sleeve Striped Polo Shirt Fashion Casual Golf Shirts
features: KNIT FABRIC: Men's knit polo shirts are made of soft premium fabric, lightweight, breathable and skin-friendly polo shirts will bring you a comfortable wearing experience.
FEATURES: Mens short sleeve knitted polo shirt with turn down collar, 3 buttons closure striped polo shirt is stylish and simple, yet with a retro flavor. Suitable for spring, summer and fall.
MATCHING : Wear a striped polo with jeans, shorts or chinos for a more casual look; You also could wear a polo shirt with a blazer or suit pants for a fashion businss look.

OCCASION: Mens knit polo t shirt is perfect for all occasions, such as: casual, business, golf, daily wear, office, work, meeting, party, dating, street, graduation, etc. Great choice for Christmas, New Year, Valentine's Day, Father's Day or Birthday gifts.
GARMENT CARE: Machine Washable. Note: This men's knit striped polo shirt is in standard US size, please choose your size refer to the size information under the description before ordering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Buena calidad de la prenda y buen servicio de entrega.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good, but maybe not great
reviews.reviewText: I think if I were built like the model in the product listing, I would like this COOFANDY Men's Knit Polo Shirt a bit more, but some things about it don't quite sit right.First, the design is okay, but the material is exceedingly thin. This is a perfect shirt to wear golfing - when you're going to be standing in the sun (required to wear a collar) and don't want to sweat yourself to death. As a golf shirt, the thinness of the material is a PLUS...but as an everyday casual polo you would wear around town...this may not be the best option.There are three things I don't like about the design of the shirt:1) the bottom of the shirt has a knit waistband that pulls in in close to the body. For this reason, you know this is not a shirt you are supposed to tuck in. It's almost more like a sweater in this respect.2) the shoulder seams are in a very odd location. I'm used to shirts having the shoulder seam run right along the top of the shoulder, but this shirt has the seam on the back of the shoulders. In itself, this is not a problem, but that design seems to make the back of the collar drop much lower than normal. Again, the collar is acting more like a sweater than a polo. It's not a deal breaker, just an oddity in the fit.3) the knit material is clingy and will emphasize any extra bulges or lumps you may have around your midsection....and the horizontal strips don't help. I consider myself an athletic-looking body type, but this shirt (the material+lines) made me look much wider than I actually am. Again, it is not a deal breaker, but it is something to consider if you're in a group picture at the course.OVERALL: I could not rate it a perfect score because the added waistband is really causing a fit issue (with me) and is not something I would expect to see in a "golf" polo (knit or otherwise).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well-Made and Hangs Nicely
reviews.reviewText: My boyfriend doesn't usually wear short-sleeved collared shirts, but it's always nice to have options available for the hotter days of the year, particularly in Florida. This shirt appears well-made and hangs nicely on him. The collar actually sits flat without having to fight with or iron it, which is a plus. The material is breathable but sturdy, so it's perfect for hot Florida summer days. I'm not typically a huge fan of horizontal stripes, but somehow this pattern doesn't exaggerate his midsection like some others do. The seams are secure and do not pop under moderate stretching, and there were no loose threads either at the seams or on the buttons.The shirt comes in a variety of colors, allowing it to be matched with all colors of dress pants or jeans. There is a subtle but very interesting stitch pattern near the seams, which makes the shirt look like it would be a more upscale brand. It would be a great golf shirt or suitable for many other outdoor activities, as it doesn't seem to accumulate moisture quickly (no immediate sweat spots).Overall, this is a good value for the cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It isn't a natural material but it is super pleasant to touch. It looks nicely on the chest and it moves with the body. Almost exactly like the main picture. Breathable. Nice near skin touch on the arms as well. Stripes are even and collar too. Washes well. Got M and it is true to size, for reference my husband is 6'2, 43 chest, fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Feels Good but Stitched Oddly
reviews.reviewText: While this shirt looks and feels good while wearing it the stitching leaves some to be desired. If you look in the pictures, you'll see what I mean. It may only be this shirt however I would be wary and check the product you receive carefully. These pictures represent the area around the shoulder. The stitching seems misaligned and makes this seem look odd when wearing it. For a casual trip to the store it's great for anything more formal I would pass on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fine shirt that doesn't wash well
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice feeling shirt that has some issues. The shirt is very fashionable, and the image here on Amazon is very accurate to the color and design of the shirt. The shirt is a very soft fabric that breathes nicely; it is an extremely comfortable shirt to wear in hot weather. The cut of the shirt is okay. I wish the sleeves were a bit smaller so they didn't hang loose, but maybe I just need to do more curls. I also wish the shirt was longer in the body. I have a long torso, so it may not be an issue with you. The only serious complaint I have is with the elastic at the bottom and sleeves. It just isn't strong enough, so it now hangs loose with awkward waffling. I've washed the shirt carefully with other sweaters and dried barely on low, but the elastic still has not aged well. There is no stretch left at all after just one or two wears. I want to love this shirt, but it has some issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Mens Polo
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice mens polo. It looks really dressy so good to wear as your everyday shirt. Or it will be nice address with some slacks to go out to a nice restaurant. good strech to it as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: SORRY BUT I RETURNED ALL COOFANDY
